name: Heartgard Plus Chewable Tablets
description: Chewable tablet for dogs that prevents heartworm disease and intestinal parasites.

name: Revolution Plus Topical Solution for Cats
description: Topical solution for cats that treats and controls fleas and ear mites.

name: NexGard Spectra Chewable Tablets for Dogs
description: Broad-spectrum chewable tablet for dogs that treats and controls fleas, ticks and mites.

name: Clavamox Chewable Tablets
description: Antibiotic medication for dogs and cats to treat a variety of bacterial infections.

name: Apoquel Tablets
description: Medication for dogs to control allergic dermatitis (itchy skin) caused by environmental allergies.

name: Frontline Gold Spot On for Dogs
description: Topical solution for dogs that kills and repels fleas and ticks for several months.
